attributes.action: Ask the Queen to submit a “Code for Royal Persons” for Parliamentary approval.
attributes.background: It is Parliament's job to hold the Monarchy to account. Binding and transparent standards are required to enable this. Only those royals who agree to the Code ("Royal Persons") and their minor children should be entitled to hold royal titles or be in the line of succession or receive our money.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for the Royal Family, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578702
